title: Tassel
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: White linen tassel teardrop-shaped base that is braided over. From the top of the core hang knotted elements of varying lengths. A cluster of knotted elements also hangs from the bottom center of the core.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tassel.
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-51-62.
